Developers Guide¶

Mozhi developers environment comes with following options: * Running everything on local machine * Running everything on Docker containers and port forwarding to host machine as needed * Run inside the Kubernetes cluster * Hybrid combinations

Demo:

  • Minikube
  • Load and Prepare Demo Data for UI
